IES Information

In order forInternational Education & Services (IES) to approve CPT, you must be enrolled in a degree required internship course during the semester you will be completing the internship.

Duration of CPT

CPT is only granted for one semester and you can only work for:

  • 20 hours per week during the fall or spring semester
  • 40 hours during the summer
  • this includes hours of on campus employment
